data.text:
American School Bus Company- Orland Park, formerly known as Liberty Bus Service, has continually provided school bus service to many of the southwest suburban communities since 1984.

American School Bus Company- Orland Park is a member of Cook-Illinois Corporation, which is the largest family owned and operated school bus organization in the country and among the top ten public and private school bus companies nationwide.

The American School Bus Company-Orland Park has successfully operated both regular and special education buses from our present facility for more than twenty years. Personal care for our customers is important, so each school district is typically assigned its own supervisor and dispatcher to ensure maximum efficiencies in all phases of the operation.

Excellent drivers, superior trainers, an outstanding safety record and regular maintenance programs performed at our full-service, on-site facility are all part of the quality and service that American School Bus Company provides.

Call us at 708-349-1866 to discuss your school transportation needs.

At American School Bus in Orland Park IL, we are always hiring for School bus Drivers. We offer Free CDL Training and you can also collect a sign-on bonus if you already have a Class “B” license with school bus and passengers endorsements. Also, we are looking for school bus monitors and school bus mechanics.
